alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Nacogdoches; Rusk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 02 at 7:33PM CDT until April 02 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Rusk County in northeastern Texas... Northwestern Nacogdoches County in eastern Texas... Central Cherokee County in northeastern Texas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 732 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Elkhart, or 12 miles southeast of Palestine, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained storm spotter. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rusk, Alto, Ponta, Sacul, New Salem, Maydelle, Trawick, Douglass, Cushing, Gallatin, Reklaw, Glenfawn, Lilbert, Linwood and Looneyville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for eastern and northeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for eastern and northeastern Texas.
